reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and appreciate its beautiful satin material, though some note it's too shiny.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made
items.body: The pictures didnâ€™t do it justice. This is beautiful dress and the material is lined. I did have to trim a little on the length since Iâ€™m only 5 foot three. And itâ€™s an extra small. Read more
items.author: Chantal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!
items.body: I Just took it out of the bag, it's wrinkled and there's laundry in the picture...but I wanted to review it now because, I LOVE THIS DRESS!!! The color is beautiful and not a pink that you see every day. It has crisscross ties in the back so you can tighten it to customize it to your own body. It flares out at the bottom, but it's not so long that I trip on it. I got size XL. I'm 5'6" and I weight 166. The material is light and thin but no see thru. Not stretchy. Satin with a pattern. Super simple dress that looks very elegant and pretty. Read more
items.author: K. George

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, terrible quality
items.body: The dress is super cute and fit nicely however it arrived with both straps not attached to the dress so i had to sew them and then the night of my event the zipper came off and I had to sew myself into the dress as it was my only option. I guess i can be glad the zipper didnâ€™t bust mid event ðŸ«  would not purchase again. Only go one wear out of the dress. Read more
items.author: Fidelita Levy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but. . .
items.body: The dress is a pretty dress. I had to return it. It was too tight in the hips and loose in the waist. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty dress!!
items.body: the dress is gorgeous! a little bit more pink than the picture, but otherwise it looks just like it! the zipper didnâ€™t really come down when i tried to pull it, so i ended up slipping it over my head. the quality is also a bit cheaper than i wouldâ€™ve expected for the price. the strings for the corset back and straps are pretty thin and a little hard to work with and it feels pretty thin, but it fit almost perfectly. the bust was a little smaller than the measurement it said, but it still works for me! Read more
items.author: A Wood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought this over the $100 version
items.body: I saw this dress on a website several months ago and fell in love, but it was well over $100. I reversed searched the dress on Amazon, and found this one. I could tell from comparing the photos that it wasnâ€™t a re-creation or knock off, they were the EXACT same dresses. The other was just marked up a lot because it was on an aesthetic website. This is super common, so always reverse search your favorite higher priced items!! It no more or less ethical, because theyâ€™re all paying the factories the same amount. Onto the dress itself: the dress is BEAUTIFUL in person but I was surprised by how thin the material was. I wouldnâ€™t say it wrinkles super easily, but it definitely does crease easily, as you can see around my hips and under my bust, where the dress would gather. Iâ€™m wearing this dress at 5 months pregnant. The corset back helped me look SNATCHED. I really didnâ€™t look pregnant from the front, but belly was on full display when I turned to the side. As I said, the material is very thin, so itâ€™s not going to really hold you in or do a lot of disguising. Iâ€™m larger chested and definitely struggled to keep my cleavage from being too exposed, as the the top would kinda flop open. I think a C or D cup would fit this dress size (Small) best. Iâ€™m also 5â€™2 and wearing tall platform heels. Read more
items.author: Kenzee

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars used.. but i like it so im buying again.
items.body: first off, the dress is beautiful. but, it is so clearly used. thereâ€™s a light brownish stain on it. the girl who returned this most def had BO, and tried to cover it up using loads of perfume. nonetheless the color is nice and it fits good. iâ€™m 5â€™3 and with 3 inch heels it is perfect length. but, if u r gonna return a clearly used product, literally save everyone elseâ€™s money and just resell it saying its used. luckily i like it enough im gonna buy it again, and if it comes back as a used dress it will very much pmo me. Read more
items.author: A & M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
items.body: Absolutely loved this dress! Got it last minute for a my courthouse elopement but loved the fit so much I decided to wear it for my reception party. It was super flattering I got a size medium and am 5â€™7 and 140lbs. Still floor length and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Mikayla Braxton

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Evening Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Pink, White, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
